title: Forumers rejoice at LL's torture!
content:
Yes, no matter how sad, depressed, miserable or downright pi$$ed you may be this weekend, you can take comfort in knowing that not only will I not be able to post for the next two days, but also that during said days I will be undergoing unimaginable agony.

For I have a cold, which coincides with the mandatory school camping trip, which also [Thanks to Spleen and his weather machine] coincides with a weekend of rain.

This forced march will involve numerous hikes, trips to lakes, bad cooking, sleeping on the ground with bears and snakes, annoyances, rain, leaky clothing and other miscelaneous annoyances.

I'm sure you'll take this oppurtunity to throw the requisite party, with the proper drugs supplied by Spleen. I llok forward to seeing how things go.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Forumers rejoice at LL's torture!
content: [Inhales opium, and suddenly realises that LevelLord is pouring her heart out] Say what? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img] [img]http://www.geocities.com/miniopolis/soul.txt[/img]

title: Re: Forumers rejoice at LL's torture!
content:
Spleen's got the drugs AND the weather machine? I thought he was getting the large going away banner for the party... Well, Spleen's 'mister useful' isn't he.

Anyway, I pity your having a cold. I seem to have a nasty one at the moment as well. Although I don't have to go camping...

Oh, and don't pour too much of your heart out. It's pretty tricky to pour back in.

...
*shot* [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img] --------------
[url=http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/][img]http://spikenexus.toxicsheep.com/pccw/imgs/links/pccwsml.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Forumers rejoice at LL's torture!
content:
Weather Me Up, Spleen! I could use some snow and good ol' cold!

"This forced march will involve numerous hikes, trips to lakes, bad cooking, sleeping on the ground with bears and snakes, annoyances, rain, leaky clothing and other miscelaneous annoyances."
I feel sorry for you LL; I can't even imagine how annyoing and stupid time you'll have. Those gonna be the worst days of your life! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

"I'm sure you'll take this oppurtunity to throw the requisite party, with the proper drugs supplied by Spleen. I llok forward to seeing how things go."
Ah, time for the traditional '[insert name here] is away, bring on the drugs' party!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-love.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-goth.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

Just pack an extra pair of socks, you'll be fine. ;-)

When I went on my 6th grade mandatory camping trip, I got pneumonia the night before we left, and was miserable the whole stinkin' week. Also, while we were up at the camp, there was a hiker lost in the woods, so authorities were searching the mountains around the camp, and all our hikes were cancelled... the entire week was more or less spent doing crafts and singing songs. :-P

title: *gasp*
content:
Egad. How can I possibly take pleasure in a fellow Keener undertaking such an immensely infuriating scenario? I've had this weather machine wasting energy on your location, while your misery was already guaranteed? Dammit.

You don't like my rain? My new gift... a nice 42 degree Sunday.

Our hearts go out to you.

[Pause for effect]

*whispers, "Is she gone?"*

w000000tz0rz!! Alright, y'all... here's the deal: you gimme your clothing, and I give you the amphetamines. Alternatively (or in addition), I'll take your shoes and you can have some of these cocain cubes that can be inhaled through your ear. You also need to sign over all rights to the footage of te ensuing orgy, but don't worry, it's just one signature.

I'm also taking donations for the 'LL Misery Fund'. All proceeds go toward, well, me.

P4rt4y!!Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"This is how liberty dies--with thunderous applause." -Padme

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

content:

Are you are real man?-----------------
